005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.StringAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundField;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
015
016import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
017import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
018
019@SuppressWarnings({
020    "PMD.DataClass",
021    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
022})
023@MetaschemaAssembly(
024    formalName = "Constraint Let Expression",
025    name = "constraint-let-expression",
026    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
027public class ConstraintLetExpression implements IBoundObject {
028  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
029
030  @BoundFlag(
031      formalName = "Let Variable Name",
032      name = "var",
033      required = true,
034      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
035  private String _var;
036
037  @BoundFlag(
038      formalName = "Let Value Metapath Expression",
039      name = "expression",
040      required = true,
041      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
042  private String _expression;
043
044  @BoundField(
045      formalName = "Remarks",
046      description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
047      useName = "remarks")
048  private Remarks _remarks;
049
050  public ConstraintLetExpression() {
051    this(null);
052  }
053
054  public ConstraintLetExpression(IMetaschemaData data) {
055    this.__metaschemaData = data;
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
060    return __metaschemaData;
061  }
062
063  public String getVar() {
064    return _var;
065  }
066
067  public void setVar(String value) {
068    _var = value;
069  }
070
071  public String getExpression() {
072    return _expression;
073  }
074
075  public void setExpression(String value) {
076    _expression = value;
077  }
078
079  public Remarks getRemarks() {
080    return _remarks;
081  }
082
083  public void setRemarks(Remarks value) {
084    _remarks = value;
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public String toString() {
089    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
090  }
091}
